document.full_text: kyle busch won under a yellow flag in a wild finish saturday, taking the nationwide race at talladega superspeedway when the last of 10 crashes sent mike wallace's car flipping upside down.
document.title: kyle busch wins a wild one at talladega
lines_and_colors: kyle busch won under a yellow flag in a wild finish saturday, taking the nationwide race at talladega superspeedway when the last of 10 crashes sent mike wallace's car flipping upside down.
